pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 5, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Vancouver Pride Parade.

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for Pride accredited media
    • Media wishing to cover the Prime Ministerâ€™s participation should present themselves at the south side of Bute and Robson no later than 11:00 a.m.
